title: Steamtown National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar        Scheduled Tours - August 2016 Scheduled Tours - September 2016             Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 7 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Steamtown National Historic Site Boy Scout Railroading Merit Badge Workshop      Time: 11:00 AM to 3:00 PM Location: Lackawanna Ave at Cliff St, 18503 Fees: $34/$29/$22     Sunday, August 14, 2016 A special workshop for the Scout Railroad Merit Badge aboard a seasonal passenger excursion to Gouldsboro, PA. View Details      Steamtown National Historic Site Train Excursion from Scranton to Gouldsboro      Time: 11:00 AM to 3:00 PM Location: Lackawanna Ave at Cliff St, Scranton, PA 18503 Fees: $34/$29/$22     Sunday, August 14, 2016 This almost 50-mile round-trip passenger excursion winds its way through beautiful Pocono Mountain woodlands to Gouldsboro, Pa. View Details      Steamtown National Historic Site Train Excursion from Scranton to Cresco      Time: 11:30 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Lackawanna Ave at Cliff St, Scranton PA 18503 Fees: $34/$29/$22     Sunday, August 21, 2016 Train Excursion from Scranton to Cresco View Details      Steamtown National Historic Site 2016 Entrance Fee-Free Days      Time: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Location: Lackawanna Ave at Cliff St, 18503 Fees: Waived (Entrance Fee only)     Thursday, August 25, 2016 The National Park Service turns 100 years old in 2016 and wants everyone to celebrate! All national parks, including Steamtown National Historic Site, will waive entrance fees on 16 special days in 2016. View Details      Steamtown National Historic Site Train Excursion from Scranton to Tobyhanna      Time: 11:00 AM to 3:00 PM Location: Lackawanna Ave at Cliff St, Scranton, PA 18503 Fees: $34/$29/$22     Saturday, August 27, 2016 This 50-mile round-trip passenger excursion winds its way through beautiful Pocono Mountain woodlands to Tobyhanna, Pa. View Details      Steamtown National Historic Site Railfest 2016      Time: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM Location: Lackawanna Ave at Cliff St, Scranton, PA 18503 Fees: included in Park Entrance Fee     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Visit Steamtown NHS, downtown Scranton, for Railfest 2016 on Saturday, September 3 or Sunday, September 4! View Details      Steamtown National Historic Site Railfest Excursions from Scranton to Moscow      Location: Steamtown NHS Fees: $24/$22/$17     Saturday, September 3, 2016 A 26-mile round-trip passenger excursion along the former Delaware, Lackawanna & Western Railroad Pocono mainline during Railfest 2016.
